resources.string: CREATE TABLE shootingRecord(id TEXT primary key not null, title TEXT, datetime TEXT, location TEXT, temp REAL, wind TEXT, description TEXT, gunTypeId TEXT, weather TEXT, range TEXT);
CREATE TABLE gunRecord(id TEXT primary key not null, name TEXT, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE shotRecord(id TEXT primary key not null, shootingRecordId Text, shotNumber REAL, barrelTemp REAL, targetX REAL, targetY REAL);
CREATE TABLE metawear(id TEXT primary key not null, mac TEXT);
